short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the sidebar on StackExchange to help you focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever found yourself wasting your time by clicking through all the 'related questions' or 'hot network questions' on SE? This extension allows you to hide them, so you can focus on what you actually intend to do. You can select whether you want to hide 'linked questions', 'related questions', 'hot network questions', or 'hot meta posts', separately.

Note:
This extension is made by an independent developer. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by StackExchange in any way.
